Comments.Message: Please see this discussion:[Globalization and Localization in Modern UI](https://mui.codeplex.com/discussions/442217)

Thank you for this reply, too. :D. 

I think one of the biggest Problems with mui is less written documentation. Really the only way to get to know all the classes is using the sample app. As a Suggestion I would recommend putting a Little words to this stuff to the Documentation Tab. 

(And the codeplex search sucks...)
